author: China Uncensored
description:
Xi Jinping says China is a paradise for private enterprise. But behind the glowing headlines is a harsh reality: arbitrary crackdowns, cross-provincial shakedowns, shady legal enforcement, and a new law that “welcomes” businesses—as long as they serve the Chinese Communist Party. Shelley Zhang (filling in today for Chris) exposes the truth behind China’s so-called business-friendly makeover.

title: Xi Jinping “Embraces” Foreign Companies
